bibl.title: with contributions by Olwen WILLIAMS-THORPE, Ian C. FREESTONE, Janet LANG, Wilfried VAN RENGEN, R.S. TOMBER, R.S. THORPE †, A.G. TINDLE and M.C. JONES, Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume I: Topography & Quarries. (Fouilles de l'Institut français d'Archéologie orientale. 37.)
bibl.note: nombr. tabl., figg., cartes, plans, pll.

The present volume is the first of three dealing with the archaeology of Mons Claudianus and it is a description of the settlements and quarries. - Pp. 216-232: 6.5. Quarry marks (6.5.1. Catalogue of marks, collected by D.P.S. PEACOCK and Wilfried VAN RENGEN; - 6.5.2. Discussion and analysis; - 6.5.3. Names and longer inscriptions; - 6.5.4. Graphic marks).
